testcase.purpose: Validate if sample app spacedodge can be built on iOS device

step.step_desc: If com.example.spacedodge exists in apptools-sampleapp-tests/tools/ directory, remove it Then run below commands under apptools-sampleapp-tests/tools/ directory: $ crosswalk-app create com.example.spacedodge $ cd com.example.spacedodge $ git clone https://github.com/crosswalk-project/crosswalk-samples.git $ mv crosswalk-samples/space-dodge-game/base/* app/ Update "xwalk_version" to "xwalk_app_version" in app/manifest.json file Add '"xwalk_package_id": "com.example.spacedodge", "xwalk_target_platforms": ["ios"]' to app/manifest.json file $ crosswalk-app build
Connect your iOS device to your iMac. Open iTunes->"Your Device"->Apps. Double click spacedodge app. Click "Install" button of spacedodge app on iTunes
Click "Apply" button at the lower right corner of iTunes. Check icon of spacedodge app in your iOS device
Launch spacedodge app in your iOS device
Check the homepage of spacedodge app
step.expected: You can see spacedodge UI on the device

step.step_desc: Close spacedodge app via clicking the home button, and kill spacedodge app from Task Manager
Long press the icon of spacedodge app to uninstall it

description.pre_condition: 1. Make sure the spacedodge webapp is launched on your iOS device.

step.step_desc: Check every button from spacedodge UI
